description: This intermediate-level course assumes students have a substantial understanding of ceramic processes, plus a good awareness of their own interests in the realm of ceramic expression. The instructor helps students focus their efforts by proposing specific areas of investigation. Materials fee. Offered annually. Prerequisite: ART 207 or permission of instructor.
name: Intermediate Ceramics
notes: The materials fee for ART 234 will be $185.
Not open to incoming first-year students.
